author: SohamBhattacharya
body:
#### PR description:
This PR changes the Phase-2 muon HLT paths to use the L1 GT emulator.

- The HLT menu now runs the GT emulator and produces the L1 seeds -- this may be dropped later down the line when the output of the emulator is added to the event content
- Muon HLT filters now use P2GTAlgoBlock and P2GTCandidates
- Checking the HLT summary on 100 events in [1] shows same results for these paths before [2] and after [3] the change

The implementation of the switch to use the GT emulator has been made to best of my knowledge -- I am expecting feedback from L1 and HLT experts regarding the changes.
Changes to other paths to follow once we have had a discussion on the approach.
Tagging @rovere @fwyzard @Martin-Grunewald @cms-sw/l1

Request for muons @wonpoint4 : could you please checkout this branch and check the efficiencies (vs. pt, eta) in a PU200 sample?  

[1]
`/store/relval/CMSSW_14_0_0_pre2/RelValFourMuExtendedPt1_200/GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW/133X_mcRun4_realistic_v1_STD_2026D98_noPU-v2/2590000/777888b3-4a3e-4bc8-a3b2-411fc47e8479.root`

title: [14_0_X] [Phase-2] Change Phase-2 HLT muon paths to use the L1 GT emulator
